ing: 1 bunch cilantro, stems cut off and leaves chopped
des: "This classic guacamole with creamy avocados, fresh cilantro, jalapeno, and red onion is ready to serve in just minutes."
ins: Mix diced onion, cilantro, jalapeno, lime juice and garlic. Add tomatoes and mix. Gently fold in avocados. Serve with fresh veggies or tortilla chips.
